import {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' export default function ProductDetails(cartItems,setCartItems){ const [product,setProduct]=useState(null); const [qty,setQty]=use const {id}=useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+'/products/'+id) .then((res)=>res.json()) .then((res)=>setProduct(res.product)) },[]) function addToCart(){ const newItem={product,qty} } return product &&

{product.name}

Product #{product._id}

{product.price}

- +

Status: {product.stock>0?'In Stock':'out of stock'}

Description:

{product.description}

Sold by: {product.seller}

}
